[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.

hyp_text: The average monthly salary is between 21,000 and 20,000, and the highest salary is 15 times the average salary of the 10,000 Belgian engineers.

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.

hyp_text: Sinchai Singh is the CEO of Bhug Bhajan Dagen. According, Raju Xandelwal is his assistant.

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.

[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Timḥettemt tatiknulujit d awal i yesdukklen agraw wessiɛen n tektiwin deg unnar n uṭebbeq, seg udegger-atiknuluji neɣ lmeḥwiǧat n tetiknulujit ɣer lmeɛna id-iqqaren belli lmektub n wemdan tselḥuy-it tmeẓla tagejdant iqqnen ɣer isuḍaf ussnanen akked ubani-nsen di tetiknulujit.
ref_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.

src_text: Amur ameqqran n usmedya n temḥettemt tatiknulujit cerken snat n tektiwin timatuyin: belli anerni n tetiknulujit s timmad-is itabaɛ abrid ibaɛden s waṭas ɣef tezrirt n yidles neɣ n tsertit, yarna tatiknulujit-agi daɣen tesɛa "isemda" ɣef tmettiyin i yellan d igejdanen, mačči d wid ittucaṛḍen s wudem ametti.
ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
hyp_text: The biggest problem with this kind of technology is that the people who use it are often unaware that the information they are sharing is being monitored by various government agencies, which then use it to identify and track individuals, and that this technology is also being used to spy on ordinary people, and not just on those who are considered a threat, but on anyone who is deemed suspicious, even if it's just because of their online activities.

hyp_text: The team will participate in the FIFA World Cup qualifiers in the group with Stanley, against the teams of FIK West.

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.
